name: Sidhant Sharma
description: Hi! My name is Sidhant Sharma. As a dedicated animal lover and passionate advocate for animal rights, I founded Furry Friends Alliance. With a profound connection to animals, I am committed to their welfare and strive to make a positive impact. My dedication inspired the creation of Furry Friends Alliance. Together, let's inspire others to join our cause and create meaningful change for our furry friends.

name: Parul Chauhan
description: Hi! My name is Parul Chauhan. I'm an ardent animal lover, a passionate advocate for animal rights and a proud cofounder of Furry Friends Alliance. I share a deep connection with animals and I have been working for them for the last 8 years. My deep commitment and dedication with them invoked a sense of responsibility in me towards them that I need to do something big for their welfare. Hence came Furry Friends Alliance into picture. Together we all should strive others to join the cause and make a meaningful impact on the lives of our furry friends.
